类 PreemptiveAuthHttpRequestFactory

    public class PreemptiveAuthHttpRequestFactory
extends org.springframework.http.client.HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory
    Factory for DefaultContextHttpClient, with preemptive BASIC authentication.
    另请参阅:
    DefaultContextHttpClient
